item.title: Hi Dad,
item.description:
Hi Dad,

This is the conversation thread that Barry, Jack, and I had.  To get the best flow, start at the bottom and read upward.  I realize you’ve got a lot on your mind before you leave, so you don’t have to bother with it until you get back, if you would rather.  I’m not in a hurry.

It would be nice to know if there’s anything I said that aren’t consistent with what the Bible says, so that I can get a better grasp on it.  So don’t shy away from letting me know.  :-)
